## The Colosseum 

```{r}
colosseum <- makeIcon(iconUrl = 'Roman_Colosseum_icon.png', iconWidth = 128, iconHeight = 78, iconAnchorX = 64, iconAnchorY = 64)

mm <- leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(icon = colosseum, lat = 41.8902, lng = 12.4922,
             popup = "The Colosseum")
mm
```
